long_description: Discovery hikes through the Peach State's natural and human history--includes 52 walks in Georgia's seven major regions. Authors: Ren and Helen Davis. Softcover; 439 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Peachtree Publishers; copyright 2001. Each hike is within easy reach from one of these hub cities: Rome, Gainesville, Atlanta, Columbus, Macon, Augusta and Savannah. Includes detailed maps, distance covered , terrain and difficulty. Distances of notable buildings and sites and lists of local attractions. Extensive local and natural history, covering the prehistoric, colonial, Civil War and modern eras.
short_description: Discovery hikes through the Peach State's natural and human history--includes 52 walks in Georgia's seven major regions.
